description: This file defines a React functional component 'KanbanBoard' that renders a task management board grouped by task status. It imports React, declares static columns, and provides UI elements for displaying tasks, handling loading/error states, and actions like editing and toggling task completion.

methods.name: KanbanBoard({ items, loading, error, onEdit, onToggleComplete })
methods.description: A React functional component that renders a Kanban-style task board, accepting props such as items, loading, error, onEdit, and onToggleComplete.

ctags.name: KanbanBoard
ctags.pattern: /^export default function KanbanBoard({ items, loading, error, onEdit, onToggleComplete }) {$/
